sentence.Network_en: I am Guardsman Valleroy , adjutant to Lt . Mumphreys.
sentence.Network_cn: 我是守卫瓦罗瑞, 马姆利少尉的副官.

sentence.Network_en: Ok, I know the Lieutenant. What can I do for you, Guardsman Valleroy?
sentence.Network_cn: 好吧, 我认识那少尉. 我能为你做什么, 守卫瓦罗瑞?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(G) -亿城英语 ... guardship 警戒船 guardsman 卫兵 Guatemala 危地马拉.
十八级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... gristle n. 软骨结构， 软骨 guardsman n. 卫兵, 近卫兵, 州辖预备役部队的人员 gules n. 红色.

entry.def: In Britain, a guardsman is a soldier who is a member of one of the regiments of Guards.
In the United States, a guardsman is a soldier who is a member of the National Guard.

means.word_mean: 1. a soldier who is a member of a unit called `the guard' or `guards'

auth_sentence.content: The Guardsman is a romantic comedy written in 1911 by Hungarian Ferenc Molnar.

auth_sentence.content: His young Life-guardsman, for whom he seemed to have taken a special favour.

auth_sentence.content: Another guardsman, Lance Corporal Wayne Golding, described his unit as being in a "360 degrees firefight".
